Always sent at the end of a session and loans are bundled into a single notice for each patron.
settings.noticePolicy.notices.realTime.n: Always sent when event is triggered.
settings.noticePolicy.notices.conditiona: Always sent when event is triggered and send conditions are met.
settings.noticePolicy.notices.send.longT: Send overnight with multiple loans/items by patron. Useful for long-term loans.
settings.noticePolicy.notices.send.short: Send throughout the day without multiple loans/items. Useful for short-term loans.
settings.noticePolicy.feeFineNotices.rea: Send overnight with multiple lost item fee charges by patron.
Send throughout the day with one lost item fee charge per notice.
